participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to play the guitar so I can perform my favorite pop songs in front of my friends.
I have a box of letters from my parents that I keep safe.
I am a software engineer who prides myself on finding the best tools for the job, even if they're not the most popular.
I don't have any social media presence because my time is focused on my music.
he worked hard.

content.text: Hey! I'm a software engineer who prides myself on finding the best tools for the job, even if they're not the most popular.
Nice! I'm a software engineer too. I wish I could find more time to learn and practice though.
I feel that. I like to learn new things but my time is pretty limited. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different music, but my favorite band is Radiohead. Do you have a favorite band?
I really like the band Phoenix. They're one of the few bands that I can listen to all of their albums.
I've heard good things about Phoenix, but I've never actually listened to them. What's your favorite song by them?
It's hard to pick just one favorite song, but I really like "If I Ever Feel Better." What are your hobbies?
I like to cook, play video games, and read. What about you?
I like to play video games too. I also like to go hiking and biking.
Nice! I used to love hiking but I haven't been in a while. I'm not very good at biking.
I'm not very good at it either, but I still enjoy it.
I'm glad we have some things in common. It's nice to meet you!
You too! I'm glad we met too
